item.description:
The Red Sox Natives organized this event last month with guests from Boston Happy Hour, Fun With Alcohol and Social Fun with over 50 people attending. We had a blast!

We will return to the Greatest Bar on Sunday, January 1 at 12:30pm to watch the Patriots take on the Buffalo Bills.

The Greatest Bar has kindly reserved the 2nd floor lounge area for the Red Sox Natives and guests. Enter and go to the second floor. Look for the Red Sox Natives signs. Come early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game time is 1:00pm on New Years Day.

The Greatest Bar is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station.  The Red and Blue Lines are within a 10 minute walk and street parking is also available if you arrive early.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER. 

The Greatest Bar will be offering a $10.00 (Not a typo) bucket of select beer and a cheese pizza to members and guests of our group. They are also offering $3.00 select beers for purchase.

The Greatest Bar has a minimum requirement to reserve the entire floor. Please RSVP now or ASAP as this will sell out since the Red Sox Natives are inviting several groups to join us including:

Social Fun (Isabele)

The World Is Our Playground 

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Frank and The Red Sox Natives
item.how_to_find_us: We have the 2nd floor lounge reserved for us. Look for the Red Sox Natives signs.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party -- Patriots vs Buffalo at The Greatest Bar New Years Day
